The declaration of the Hungarian War newly published by the most illustrious Michael Apafi, Prince of Transilvania, against His Imperial Majesty, 1682. Declaratio belli Hungarici. English Transylvania (Principality). Sovereign (1661-1690 : Apafi Mihály I) Apafi Mihály I, Prince of Transylvania, 1632-1690.
15 p.
Printed by J. Grantham, London : 1682.
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
